page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: THE LIFE STYLES OF MOST OF THE PEOPLE CAN BE DESCRIBED AS 'LEISURELY'. NEARLY ALL OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR BLOCK, EXCEPT FOR THE VERY OLD, ARE PEOPLE WHO HAVE CHOSEN TO LIVE IN THE AREA BECAUSE THEY WORK NEARBY OR BECAUSE THEY LIKE THE ENVIRONMENT. THE ENJOYMENT OF A QUIET, SLOW PACED RURAL LIFE STYLE IS A REASON THAT MANY PARENTS GAVE WHEN WE ASKED THEM WHY THEY CHOSE TO LIVE HERE. MANY FATHERS, PARTICULARLY THOSE WHO WORK IN LONDON SAID THAT BEING ABLE TO WORK IN THE GARDEN, WALK IN THE COUNTRYSIDE AND GET AWAY FROM THE NOISE AND BUSTLE OF CITY LIFE WERE IMPORTANT REASONS FOR THEIR CHOICE OF RESIDENCE. HOWEVER, MANY OF US CHILDREN SAID THAT WE WOULD PREFER TO LIVE IN A PLACE WHERE THERE WERE MORE THINGS TO DO.
